original_text: And unto Hamor and unto Shechem his son hearkened all that went out of the gate of his city; and every male was circumcised, all that went out of the gate of his city.
korean_text: 성문으로 출입하는 모든 자가 하몰과 그의 아들 세겜의 말을 듣고 성문으로 출입하는 그 모든 남자가 할례를 받으니라

sentences.original_text: And unto Hamor and unto Shechem his son hearkened
all that went out of the gate of his city
all that went out of the gate of his city
